website_summaries.verdict: Certified USDA BioBased insecticide, eco-friendly product, the efficacy of which is backed by scientific research studies.
pros: USDA IR4 PHP Program field-testing showed this product to be the only natural product that kills bed bugs with near 100% efficacy
Kills bed bug adults, nymphs, and eggs on contact
Dermatologically safe to use, child and pet friendly, and dried residue shown to be effective for up to 2 weeks after treatment
cons: Has a strong odor, and for intense infestation situations, use of this product becomes expensive

customer_reviews.title: Sprayed directly on bedbug. watch the result after one day!
customer_reviews.text: So. what happened is I noticed a bedbug on mattress cover thought it is a good opportunity to try this spray that i recently bought to see if it really works or not. I sprayed twice directly on bedbug and then trapped it in a transparent container. After one day! I clearly saw that the bedbug is up and running! The spray does not work at all!
customer_reviews.author: Fatemeh

customer_reviews.title: Here's what you're looking for....
customer_reviews.text: Noticed bites after a hotel stay, figured it was just bites from some at the hotel. They continued each week for the next month so I knew we had brought some home. Tore both bedrooms apart and peeled back bottom backing on the bed springs at our home and BAM there was all the evidence needed. PLEASE BUY THE GALLON AND THANK ME LATER. BBs are no joke, the longer you wait, the worse they get. The gallon its worth it... spray all base boards all around your house and check box springs, that's their number #1 hiding spot. This stuff killed them quick!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazoniann

customer_reviews.title: Natural versus Terminex
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product as well as a couple more and I would be more than happy to tell others about your product! I first started with terminex, and they did not hardly touch my problem. They were outrageous in price, and not consistent. So... I bought your product from Amazon, used it every Friday, and to my delight in am almost bug free. It really works!!
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: 🔥 PLEASE READ B4 PURCHASING 🔥
customer_reviews.text: THIS product: No residual guys. DEFINITELY works BUT no longer than 12-14 hours. After smell is gone, or whatever the ingredients.. I believe it’s the faint smell of cedar, maybe 🌲 pine? Either way, they return! This was used daily till gone! A couple times I forgot and laid down ,but within a half hour to a hour they initiated their attack! I would than use, and I got rest! This is ONLY a temporary solution guys. No residual!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie G.

customer_reviews.title: Aweful smell
customer_reviews.text: Aweful smell lasts for days. Does not kill bed bugs, still have them, and a smelly bed. Costs too much, reject good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Gomar Holnyuk

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for first application
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed!!! Paired with diatomaceous earth. Beg bugs, big ones, little ones, all dead. Not bad for first application.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: DO YOURSELF A FAVOR SPRAY THE BUG AND PUT IT IN ZIPLOC BAGGY AND MAKE SURE IT DIES, THE BUG I FOUND WAS TREATED WITH ECO RAIDER AND ITS STILL ALIVE. I've been dealing with these horrible bugs for the last few weeks and after we thought they were gone we found out we were wrong. Instead of forking out another $700 for a company to spray I wanted to try this. it unfortunately didn't work. I sprayed the bug with the chemical and put it in a bad to make sure it died and it's still alive :(
customer_reviews.author: Robin Price

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't have done w/o it!!
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apt building so the landlord ordered a crummy local exterminator, which if you ask me, whatever they sprayed only fed them. The babies that I spotted grew and after both treatments, I was still getting bit, which means either they were immune to the chemical or the exterminator just sprayed water. Luckily, my apt wasn't super infested and didn't extend past my room to my kids room. So I purchased the 16 oz bottle just test it out. Turned out that was the only bottle I needed and did not need to do the second treatment. Haven't seen another since but ordered another just in case. Thank God for this stuff!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Best spray on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Many professional exterminators use this as well as homeowners. Full-house heat treatment is still the best, but if you can't afford it or don't want to prep hassle, use this spray & repeat in two weeks while putting all your clothes, sheets, etc through the high-heat drying cycle & bagging. It is non-toxic to animals, has a slightly odd, but not unpleasant smell that fades quickly, and can be sprayed directly onto anything - mattresses, walls, floors, clothes, interior of night-table drawers, etc (don't forget the electric outlets by the bed - that's a favorite hiding place). Buy by the gallon & use at 2 week intervals at least twice or 3 times. IT WORKS. Nothing else is as good.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Wolf

customer_reviews.title: WORKS ON CAMEL CRICKETS...WOOOHOOOO!!!
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who are ODOR SENSITIVE, this solution has a very STRONG LINGERING SMELL!!! NOT STINKY, just strong. It killed a Camel Cricket(creepiest creature EVER to invade an apartment...it hops towards you!!! WHAT IN THE WORLD?!!!) SO I LOVE THIS STUFF!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annie's Corner

customer_reviews.title: Be patient, and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.text: I was waking up with classic looking bedbug bites. I sprayed this in the crevices around my bed. It smells good. Not harmful to breathe. After a couple of days; no more bites. I plan on using this as maintenance regime. These horrible creatures are very tough to completely get rid of. I am happy that I no longer look like I am living as a hoarder. Bug bites can give the impression of being unclean.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worthless product
customer_reviews.text: This product does not contain a single ingredient that can kill anything. Cedar oil, rose oil, and a detergent are all this product contains. DO NOT PURCHASE. It was a waste of money and sanity waiting for this product to work, which it did not. The only reason I give this one star is because it made my room smell like cedar.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Did not kill the bugs
customer_reviews.text: I was encouraged by all the positive reviews. But alas I was still bitten though spraying twice/day.
customer_reviews.author: DebbM

customer_reviews.title: Works 100% for DUST MITES
customer_reviews.text: We HAD dust mites, not bed bugs. Amazingly, you can spray directly on sheets or sofa and upholstered chair, and use it in 5 min. Completely eliminated dust mites, may need to use again in 2 or 3 weeks. Scent is very tolerable, last 10 15 mi . Safe for contact for kids and dogs. Actually worth the $100 per gallon. We tried 5 or 6 other sprays which did NOT work, and many had nasty odor
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: lucky I caught the little SOBs real early on, maybe a hand full. This product works very,very well. It does kill'em instantly. I have not seen any since! i thoroughly sprayed my apartment - everywhere. washed all my cloths/bedding. then I bought the encasement protectors for my boxspring and mattress, now every 2-3 weeks I just "touch-up" where I spend most of my time in the apartment, bed, living room chair, etc...If your wondering about this product - Eco Raider - I can honestly tell you it works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Keep The Bugs Away
customer_reviews.text: The apartment next door to me has Bed Bugs. I bought this product as a preventive maintenance issue. I don't want the bugs so I spray everywhere I can to help keep the bugs Out. The people next door like this product. I bought some for them and they say it kills the bugs Instantly. I pray that I don't get them.
customer_reviews.author: Birtus Dale Perritt

customer_reviews.title: Thankful I Found it!
customer_reviews.text: I was hysterical when we found bedbugs in my son's room, I hopped online and bought the first spray that cam up in the search. BIG MISTAKE! That product made my entire family dearly ill. Got back online and found this product and thank goodness for it. It worked fast, it doesn't smell toxic and was easy to use. The hardest part was remembering to shake it before I sprayed. LOL The product does smell, but it is not a toxic, choking, asthma attack causing smell like the first product I had the misfortune of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna L. Fresh

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only sprayed once so far. Plan on spraying again but need to find time we aren’t going to be home for a day. The smell, while not totally awful, was strong resulting in my husband & I reacting with a cough (were both asthmatic) and a bit of throat irritation. I wrote the company & they assured me there was nothing harmful to humans. BUT I must say, we had no evidence of bed bugs since unlike other products we have tried. It’s worth putting up with having to leave for a day.
customer_reviews.author: esther

customer_reviews.title: It works, but the scent?
customer_reviews.text: I've used this one before, but now realized why I had stopped. It's not because It's a bad product, it's good. Just the scent is one I couldn't deal with. And it lingers for a long time. So yes, good product because it was really effective. But I personally couldn't deal with the scent. But even still, I must reiterate, it WORKS.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Wright

customer_reviews.title: This worked after one application and alot of cleaning before hand.
customer_reviews.text: No chemical will work on bed bugs if you don't wash all linens and vacuum up all areas surrounding your bed. I did the cleaning. Sprayed / applied the product on the floor and mattress. Sealed the room up for about 6 hours. Then opened all windows and brought in fans to air it out. The odor of the product lingered for a few days. But it was not unpleasant. Well no bed bugs since. And I liked that this had natural ingredients so I did not worry about my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzinhornet

customer_reviews.title: STINKS forever
customer_reviews.text: I will update this more positively when I see results, to be fair. First impressions Day 1 noon begin bug bomb, air out 5pm: used a residential bug bomb as directed and felt results with almost no change in room atmosphere Sept Texas weather, using fans, whole house fan, then back to AC Day 2 3pm begin this bed bug product, air out 7pm: can't feel anything different, smells to high hell, nothing used above works to rid it, even employed Lysol as a cover. Had to sleep in all that and next day, reentering that room is still very unattractive. Lots of phlegm this morning.
customer_reviews.author: tgiv

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many different kinds of this kind of stuff and this was the only one that worked to where I got a full nights worth of sleep without being eaten alive. I foolishly went through 2 bottles and didn't follow up with this but another brand and they are back full force. I am buying the large one gallon this time and going to keep spraying every 2-4 weeks as it says till these little jerks are gone!!! Seriously I have tried everything and this is only one that worked. Don't waste your money trying to save money just buy this and keep up.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Effective but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Much more effective and MUCH better smelling than sprays found in local stores. We have been spraying about every 3 days and are ordering another gallon. However, I was surprised and disappointed to see that the price is now $89.95--a week ago it was $86.95. My calculation shows that this gallon equals 8 of the 16 oz. bottles so it is still more cost effective than buying the 16 oz. bottle. If you have these nasty critters, don't waste your time starting with two 16 oz bottles as we did. I deducted a star because a $3 price hike in one week seems off to me.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Finally found one that works!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried so many products to get rid of bed bugs with no success. We even had the house treated professionally and still no success. we were skeptical about trying yet another product but we read about so many success stories that we hesitantly ordered Eco Raider. After only one use we are finding on dead bugs or shells or bugs or occasionally one on the wall or ceiling. It has been a few weeks since we treated it and so far it is working great. We definitely recommend it to anyone having a bed bug problem..
customer_reviews.author: B. Amstutz

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: This product worked very well! I squirted several bed bugs directly and they were dead within seconds. I sprayed every seam around the mattress and then enclosed the entire mattress in an encasement. Same for the box spring. I intend to purchase more bottles (or a gallon) to keep on hand and continue my spraying regime. There was a slight odor to the spray but opening the window for a half hour took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthiadb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bed bug killer
customer_reviews.text: This WORKED. My son was bit for weeks before I could figure out what might be going on. At first I sprayed corners of room and bed and it teased out the bed bug to confirm that was the vermin. I recommend just spraying ALL surfaces of the floor and bed. One stray bug escaped to the hallway when I didn’t spray everything. I closed the door after spraying. Cracked the window, waited a couple days and repeated several more times when I found no more dead bugs. I like that the chemical was a little safer since it was for my 3 year olds room
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection, Well, It seemed so
customer_reviews.text: It is mostly a preventive measure, I used it while in South Carolina in an apartment complex that didn't warn us(military spouse) that they had bed bugs. We had to fight with them about it and lost most of our things moving out about a year later. We sprayed out bed with it when we got it and kept them away for a while but they eventually ignored it. In the long run, it isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith Krynesh

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Worked as described I sprayed the top of the bed flip it over sprayed the back and everywhere around it every corner bed frame and pillow underneath the bed closed all windows and doors so the spray will stay in my room as long as possible had to order the jug since I used more than half of the bottle spray in one sitting sprayed again 3 days later and kept away from my room for a week then washed all my bed sheets and haven’t seen any bed bugs will spray again next week just to make sure I got rid of them so far I haven’t had any problems this stuff works and recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jose F.

customer_reviews.title: Pet and child friendly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help kill bed bugs I was dealing with. First spray on a bed bug, killed it instantly. Also kills the eggs. Treated whole apt including all furniture. The scent is not horrible, its a cedar scent, so I am able to stand the smell. I use this along with diatomaceous earth food grade for the bed bug troubles I've had. I love that its pet friendly as I have a cat in my apt. Yes, I do recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: It works but false labeling of scent, low odor and pet friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product, it helps for sure. Applied it and diatomaceous powder and I’ve not “seen” a bedbug crawl on me. That’s the worst “I turn into a silly girl, when I feel/see one on me!! These products take care of multiple creepy crawlers/jumpers in fact. It says it’s “Cedar Scent” low odor and safe to use around various pets. NO disrespect but SORRY 😐 NO!! It smells NOTHING like Cedar!! It is NOT LOW ODOR!! We HAVE TO wear a protective mask go outside AFTER Treatment otherwise you’ll have a chemical high and feel nauseated 🤢 It works but I think you should be more honest and change your labeling.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa G

customer_reviews.title: Seemed fine
customer_reviews.text: I think the product was fine (I can really say for sure if it killed the bed bugs, as we had to do other treatments too. I was grateful for an environmentally and people safe product) We also got a steam cleaner, so I do think the two of them were effective. We have had no other sign of bed bugs and it has been over a month. We did also get rid of the bed frame (woven bamboo) and switched to metal. Got a bed proof mattress cover (which actually isn't that bad). I only gave it a 4 because I just don't know for sure. But I was happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: JC.   Flower

customer_reviews.title: It actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I order this for the elderly tenants and they use it for every pesky insect known to man, so once one persons raves about it, another person wants me to order it, I used it personally over a year ago and I have not had an issue since using it! Its absolutely Great and it really does kill on contact! Thank you Eco Raider!
customer_reviews.author: I AM

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy anything else! IT WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stuff. This is our second time buying it and it does wonders killing bedbugs. Had the little buggers a few years ago brought in from guests. Worked fast and easy to use in a spray bottle. Gone in a week. Their back again so spraying everything along with keeping extra on hand. Found it odd being on self isolation getting them. Only 1 person in the house had to work so fingers pointing at him from apartment hunting after work. He's moved out and the bugs are dead! Safe for my pets and the scent is not too bad. Will buy more again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lauer

customer_reviews.title: Won't know if it's effective because the sprayers are cheap crap
customer_reviews.text: Got a pair of these for small but nasty issue with bedbugs. Went to apply, and neither sprayer works worth a spit. First one, the plunger was too tight to even move except by prying out with a small screwdriver, then would hang on first squeeze. Second one was good for about 2 pumps before it hung. So. Do I return them and get replacements that are going to be saddled with the same cheap sprayers, or do I go buy a $4 sprayer at Lowe's and pour the product into it??? Isn't life full of difficult decisions?
customer_reviews.author: Apex shopper

customer_reviews.title: Saved our lives!
customer_reviews.text: This product was amazing for our bedbug problem! We've never had an issue before and didn't know what to do. I searched Home Depot, Lowe's, & other Amazon products and ended up buying things that didn't get rid of the bugs. After reading these reviews, I took a chance on EcoRaider and boy am I glad! The bugs were greatly depleted after one bottle but completely gone after two. I would recommend buying two at a time just to attack completely. I really liked the smell and so did my husband. It reminded us of cedarwood oil, which we had also tried as a natural remedy. I've already encouraged another friend to purchase this for her own bed bug issue.
customer_reviews.author: KeltheBelle

customer_reviews.title: nasty smelling and its not effective at all waste of money I will return unused product the smell ...
customer_reviews.text: nasty smelling and its not effective at all waste of money I will return unused product the smell is unbearable and stays for days
customer_reviews.author: Bill Oxner

customer_reviews.title: Something changed!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as effective as it used to be. Even the scent is not as powerful and lasting like a few years back. I used to spray it and a strong smell would last for a considerable amount of time. Now it is different. It does kill on contact but doesn’t last enough to kill after it dries. We had a problem a few years back and using this product contributed largely in solving the problem. Now the same problem resurfaced from a tenant but when I bought this product it definitely different
customer_reviews.author: M. Helmi

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: We got bed bugs. It was a nightmare. I stripped and washed everything, threw out the matress that had them and the beautiful pottery barn sleigh bed and sprayed this stuff everywhere and put down the white powder and we got rid of them thank goodness. We caught the problem early bc I’m fanatically clean and wash bed clothes weekly so that probably helped too. This stuff works! And it’s no. Toxic and firs year have a terrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Hait

customer_reviews.title: Very strong pesticide odor. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely toxic smelling. The aroma is extremely overwhelming. Could not use not a lil bit before I had to stop application. I only stayed a 3x6 area to test this product. My entire home reeked of the pesticide odor. Not pet friendly not human friendly. I am concerned about being misled on the description of this product. People need to know how intense the pesticide odor is I have allergies and was affected immensely because of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eldon Eroh

customer_reviews.title: Hire a professional. Will be cheaper in the long run.
customer_reviews.text: This just seemed to agitate the bedbugs. And I could not get past the smell. I don't mind a lot of scents, I would consider myself someone who enjoys cedar or woodsy smells, but this one really bothered me. And after spraying and then encasing mattresses, it seemed like we got more bites than before. Ended up hiring a professional exterminator anyway. Return was easy and quick, however, which is why I give them 2 stars instead of 1.
customer_reviews.author: jvic

customer_reviews.title: I can’t be positive that this worked. Managed to ...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t be positive that this worked. Managed to pick up some of these critters at my indoor storage unit and ended up getting heat treatment 3 times until I realized that the bugs appeared about a week after each visit to my unit. I can say that I didn’t smell anything at first, but I did get a massive headache. I never get headaches so I was surprised. The smell gets stronger a while after you spray.
customer_reviews.author: MOMSlist

customer_reviews.title: Does work, might need more than 1.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not immediately apparent if this stuff works or not. The spray says it kills on contact but a test of this claim shows the exact opposite. However, it’s not ineffective. I tested this spray against pure isopropyl alcohol and obviously no treatment at all. Isopropyl seemed to be more effective at killing on contact but completely evaporated so had no lasting effect. Eco raider, however, did prevent bugs from returning to a location to hide. I could not test if this spray prevented bugs from traveling across a treated area. I would not suggest using this spray as your only solution But it does work. And the smell isn’t all that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Product not consistent. Some worked. Then bought some that didn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: When the 16 ounce spray bottle worked great I then bought 1 gallon. All adults were dead. But some babies hatched so I refilled from gallon and sprayed often. I noticed it wasn’t killing the babies. Now as adults again, I made video of bed bug after I sprayed twice. Eight hours and it’s still not dead. Gave three stars because 16 ounce size worked. Zero stars because gallon didn’t do anything. And yes I shook it before use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W

customer_reviews.title: Most amazing product ever ..
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic -. Allot of products say they are great , this one trully is - have not seen one since using this one - sprayed beds for a few nights they not only drop they all were ended !!! And have not returned !!!!! I'm buying it again and will continue to use for the next month just to be diligent and it smells so great-. The hype and reviews are real it's REAL !!! Thank you thank you whomever made this !!!!!! Yay !! You saved the day !!!!
customer_reviews.author: mightymite

customer_reviews.title: Ecologically safe non poisonous way to treat
customer_reviews.text: My in-laws brought bed bugs back from their travels to Hilton Head Island. They stayed overnight at my mother-in-laws house on the way back to their home, and then phoned us from their home later to let us know of their discovery. I used this spray in conjunction with bed bug resistant mattress and pillow covers in her guest room. I only saw adult castings, but vacuumed and sprayed on a weekly basis for several weeks to ensure I wiped them out completely. I was pleased with the results. We seemed to have stopped them before they got out of hand.
customer_reviews.author: R. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I tried this product & one other and came back to this one and so far so good I know this is not a quick process getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Never in my wildest dreams did I ever think I'd have bed bugs.I tried this product & one other and came back to this one and so far so good I know this is not a quick process getting rid of them It says spray every 2wks but I'm obsessed and pretty much spray it daily... I like the fact it's safe around my animals..it doesn't stain and the smell is not bad at all and does go away in a very short time I will probably end up buying stock in the company before I feel comfortable in my own home again. Thank you EcoRaider
customer_reviews.author: Jane h

customer_reviews.title: No bites!
customer_reviews.text: So here's the story, me and my partner kept waking with bites, not a lot, one-night hed get it, some nights I would some nights neither, our apt did a bed bug sweep but found nothing as well. they even brought one of those bed bug-sniffing dogs. and still nothing found. So I got this stuff to spray our bed every so often and since using neither one of us has had any bites! So I cant confirm it kills bed bugs, but it rid us of whatever was biting us!
customer_reviews.author: NeffBrooke

customer_reviews.title: Wear a mask!😷
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT what I ordered, but I don’t have the energy to deal with the hassle. I do NOT have bed bugs! 😡. I have ants & spiders. This stuff STINKS, doesn’t work on everyday insects, the smell takes forever to dissipate. Meantime you’ll gag & cough! If you can even stay in the same room. I’m REALLY P.O.’d they sent me the wrong stuff, but like I said, I don’t have the energy to deal w/the hassle of returning it. (Health problems 🤢) I guess if you have bed bugs, I really can’t say how it works. But the smell is too much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like eucalyptus oil
customer_reviews.text: It has a strong natural smell, like eucalyptus oil!?! It does take more then 2 hours to fade away....more like all day - 8 hours. I sprayed on wood, fabric, carpet and mattress and nothing seemed to get damaged. As the day goes on, you can see the bugs try to crawl away from where you sprayed (making them easy to kill). You definitely need to spray again after 1 week, 2 weeks to keep it up. 1 spraying does not kill all of them. But I am seeing positive results, less bugs so far...but not 100% gone yet. They are elusive!!!! I will continue to use till I know they are all gone.
customer_reviews.author: ejohnson

customer_reviews.title: WORKED FOR ME , SHIPPING PACKAGING VERY GOOD.
customer_reviews.text: THE ODOR IS OVERWHELMING AND OVERPOWERING UNLESS USED WITH GOOD VENTILATION . I YSED I GALLON AND ONE 16 ounce sSPRAY BOTTLE AND IT WORKED GREAT FOR ME . THE GALLON WAS SHIPPED IN A SEALED PLASTIC BAG. THE BOTTLE CAP WAS ON VERY TIGHT WOPITH A LOCKING CAP AND A HRD PLASTIC BSEAL INSUDE . ONCE I GOT IT OPEN IT WA EASY TO POUR THE VERY MIKKY LOOKING IQUID . I USED UT AS A PREVIOUS CUSTOMER RECOMMEND AND INA WEEK MY APARTMENT IS CLEAR OF BED BUGS AND ANTS AS WELL ,
customer_reviews.author: WEIRLIGHT

customer_reviews.title: See video. I will revise my review positively once ...
customer_reviews.text: See video. I will revise my review positively once this is rectified. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: This product is pet and child friendly
customer_reviews.text: The whole reason I choose Ecoraider was that it was safe for everyone, except the bugs. We used a dual prong attack on the nasty little blighters. Because it is non-harmful, I sprayed everything: cracks, mattress baseboards, EVERYTHING. Then we put down the pest grade "D" dirt. We washed everything, Dried everything. We have seen a great reduction in the number of pests. Only seeing 2nd and 3rd stage now. I discovered them on the evening of June 5th. Didn't have to worry about my cats or dog, nor my 3 yr old grandchild. And it appears to be working. Great Product so far I will know for sure in a month.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Idk seems to work. Smells like wood
customer_reviews.text: The spray is oily and smells strongly like cedarwood. The smell is very overpowering but as it dissipates the room will have a woody smell like home depot or a forest. I think it worked. I sprayed the mattress and the walls and curtains near my bed. Haven't got bit or seen a bug, and when DID see ONE, he was on a part of the couch I sprayed and he was lethargic and dried out. Dying I guess. Could've been the spray? Who knows. Plus there's a lot of product. So it's worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jerilyn Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: I'll tolerate the smell
customer_reviews.text: I hate bed bugs..no whats beyond the word hate? Loathe bed bugs. What's good about them? They deficate on your things, bite you, hide in crevices, and even know how to flatten themselves if you try to kill them. Now I'm an animal and nature person, but these things are at the top of the digusting list. Once they're in, no matter how hard you try, they hide, and crap on your stuff. This spray is really good. The smell can be a little strong, but that just fine with me. Neutral smell and bed bugs, or strong pine smell and bye bye bed bugs. I'll take the nauseating pine.
customer_reviews.author: Reece

customer_reviews.title: The year is 2047 and my couch still stinks.
customer_reviews.text: No idea if this stuff works or not because I panic bought it when I got bit by something in my house. But the smell..... Come on.... It's day 4 and my couch and house still stinks. I have since sprayed the same areas with peppermint and wiped them down with fabric softener sheets. It still smells. Doors and windows open with the fan on them....still stinks. At this point I think I would have been better just burning down the house because at least that smell would have gone away by now ...... Still stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: This sh** works!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing, the smell is super strong, and makes me gag, but to get rid of bed bugs I will deal with it! Upon my first application I found a live bug and sprayed him to see what would happen within 20 seconds he was dead! And I mean super dead!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Killed the bugs. I plan to treat again after 1 week. There were a few left in the recliner but I think maybe they crawled in from somewhere else that may not have been sprayed properly. Smell is intense but not offensive. Also a gallon goes a long way, at least longer than I was expecting. I have 4 indoor dogs so the non-toxic factor is very important. The smell does not seem to bother the dogs. Treated again after a week. Seeing a few bugs but almost no bug bites. I will continue to treat for another week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Lyddon

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like cedar, pine or mint
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t have an active infestation, but had guest over who we found out had them. We treated as a preventative knowing they can lay dormant for up to a year. Hopefully it will help any potential outbreak. My main issue is with the smell. It’s been a week since we treated and the room is still hard to walk into. We’ve left windows open, ran a diffuser for several days, etc, but still walk in to the overpowering smell.
customer_reviews.author: L Pace

customer_reviews.title: Buy a gallon
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have used other products and this by far works best. The smell is not the greatest however, if it does the job, which it does, then I will live with it. And the best part is it’s pet and kid friendly. Like everyone says you do need to follow all the steps to get rid of the evil little bastards, but it doesn’t have to cost a fortune. Also, buy a gallon, more is better. Clean, vacuum and spray. Be vigilant. I never would of imagined I would ever have to deal with the unmentionables. It can happen to anyone. You got this!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for bed bugs
customer_reviews.text: Guys, for bedbugs what worked for me is putting a mattress cover that trapped the bed bugs inside the cover (zipped up). This spray didn’t do much since I was still getting bitten after using it. I sprayed it all over the room and mattress. It didn’t kill the bed bugs. But what worked for me is buying a mattress cover with a zipper. I hope no one has to suffer from bed bugs!!! It’s terrible and we all need a good night sleep. I hope getting a mattress cover works for anyone being troubled by bed bugs. Good luck to all!
customer_reviews.author: Masum Billah

customer_reviews.title: Safe and effective! Get it before they get you.
customer_reviews.text: A friend got bed bugs when one of her friends failed to tell her they had them. As a precaution I got some EcoRaider Bed Bug Killer and our pest control guy used some powder around the house and we treated all of our furniture. I'm very happy to report that we have not had any issue AND it's helping to kill the ticks our staffordshire brought home when she went off on a 3 day romp in the woods. This product is well rated and I'm happy with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Dva

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment that unfortunately had problems. We ended up with bed bugs we tried a lot of other product but this one is the only one that worked. After 2 applications they were completely gone. I continued to use it as a preventative spraying it in the hallway outside of my apartment in the hallway and regularly treating my entry way. So thankful for this product! The smell can be a little overwhelming but it’s not awful just like you stuck your head in a cedar box.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Of the three naturopathic brands I have tried (2 others purchased at Lowe's) this is by far the BEST! The cedar smell does not last more than ...
customer_reviews.text: Highly reccomend! Of the three naturopathic brands I have tried (2 others purchased at Lowe's) this is by far the BEST! The cedar smell does not last more than an hour at most. Very effective, stopping them in their tracks immediately, and finding them dead on our bed after spraying the box spring cover at night and morning. Get mattress and pillow enclosures made for bed bugs too. Very helpful. Get several bottles and be persistent. We almost have them conquered after months of not knowing what the heck was going on until realizing what the "beetles" were in our bedroom. Yeesh!
customer_reviews.author: A. Potteiger

customer_reviews.title: This worked amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had tried several different products and this one worked after just one application. Bed bugs are a torture if you happen to get them in your home. Mine were carried in with a like new couch that I purchased. They terrorized my home. This spray worked like a charm. It has been over a year since I have seen a bed bug thankfully. Highly recommend. The smell was a bit strong to me but dissipated quickly and well worth it to resolve the issue. I just sprayed and then left the home for a while to let it air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it save your money
customer_reviews.text: Is my first time doing a bad review about anything but I feel this time I have to. If you use alcohol or any other product your have better luck with bed bugs. I have seen 100 times more now than I’m using this product, and to kill them you have to drown them one by one I totally regret buying it no only for the money, the problem now is out of control because of this product. Save your money and don’t put your family in jeopardy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product work wonderful so far I don't have any bug's
customer_reviews.text: Product work wonderful so far I don't have any bug's. Make sure you follow up the instructions and start using light color sheets so you can see any traces of this bug they are really hard to get rid off but ecoraider is working great. I am two months bug free but you have to remain alert, since they said the can come back due to sometimes you don't get the eggs and make sure you vacuum all the crevasses to get those little egg and after that get some B.B. cover. Thank you ecoraider
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: We are bedbug free now!
customer_reviews.text: We had a pretty bad problem and with the use of this awesome product and then super heating our home to over 140 degrees for over 12 hours and then running food grade diatomaceous earth powder along all the baseboards and under the beds and other furniture, we solved this problem! We also got rid of Our old mattresses and bought new ones. It is a lot of work, yes, but all of it is needed to get them gone for good! We loved this product as the child, pet and elderly safe residual element needed for the complete process recommended to us by a licenced exterminator friend of ours. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wells

customer_reviews.title: Life. Saver.
customer_reviews.text: I had been waking up with itchy arms and bumps, these turned out the be bed bug bites. I later cleaned my room thoroughly and went as far as throwing out my sheets. Just found one bedbug but I was paranoid and since my roommate has really sensitive skin and allergies I figured this would be the perfect spray. I used it about 4 times all around the permits of my bed and there was still plenty left. It's now been months and I haven't had another issue with bedbugs.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother got bed bugs in her apt..... and this totally works!!! I still buy even tho she doesnt have anymore cuz u never know.... the stupid bugs move apt to apt.. its crazy!!! I even bought one for my house so when I travel (I dont go anywhere without it)
customer_reviews.author: Liley

customer_reviews.title: The smell....
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited for this product, I had been plagued with bed bugs living in an older apartment building for months. Nothing worked. This, along with diligent cleaning and buying a steam cleaner and diatomaceous earth helped me rid myself of them. Four months without a bite. The scent is strong and was potent for nearly a week...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C. Knight

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved into a place and the same night I was warned of bed bugs. Immediately got to searching for something would work 100%. THIS DOES! I did see 1 or 2 that same night I moved in. This came 2 days later and I sprayed it. I have only seen dead ones. I sprayed throughly, everywhere. Luckily I didn’t move all of my things in yet which helped a lot and I have hard wood floors. Anyway I’ll be purchasing the bigger gallon because I want to keep it up spraying weekly. Day 2 and I’m nearly out. Buy the biggest size or case!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis A

customer_reviews.title: Would order again if had to....don't really want to!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really stinks but for the price and the safety for my child and the fact that we had one bed bug that was seen and I ended up immediately ordering stuff just in case it was an outbreak like there was no bites after use of this and also that doctoumeious Earth ( wthe the spelling is) and a good vacuum on beds and special pretty cheap mattress ENCASEMENTS!!!! So I think it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Willyard

customer_reviews.title: Not just for bedbugs!
customer_reviews.text: I've not had bed bugs in my home but I use this product for in-home pest control. Every summer, ants try to invade my home. I have 8 cats that live indoors so I'm very careful about spraying any toxic and dangerous pesticides inside my house. This product is awesome! It smells great and works to kill any ants, spiders, and other assorted creepy-crawlies (ewww, silverfish...) that dare to venture inside the home. I highly recommend this product for all household bug problems.
customer_reviews.author: kimi mac

customer_reviews.title: Good if you use
customer_reviews.text: This product is good but you need to take care that this is not put in the area where you normally walks in home. Try to put it areas like behind refrigerator, stove, corners mostly in the kitchen area. Please also make sure to Put but not within the premises where you normally sleeps. Also it may give you skin reactions as we tried put on all the edges in living room and we used to have lot of itching while on bed.
customer_reviews.author: Swapnil

customer_reviews.title: Works as Preventative
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a presentative. My apartment unit didn't have a bed bug infestation but the neighbor diagonally across the hall did. A company came out to spray that apartment three times, so far. I have not had one bed yet... So far so good. The company sprayer said he has heard that cedarwood oil works but his company didn't sell it. If things change, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, this is worth it and start with at least a gallon.
customer_reviews.text: Product worked like a charm. We found them in our couch but needed a pet friendly spray to help us get rid of them. We sprayed around 3 times over a span of 6 weeks. It's been over a year and we haven't seen a single sign of them after spraying the second time. We weren't so pleased with the smell but with how well it works it's totally worth it! Edit: A word of advice, spray the baseboards and any doorways FIRST then work your way to what you think is the source. We did this and didn't have any issues with them migrating to other rooms or furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Saved $2000
customer_reviews.text: We are not sure how bed bugs came into our home as we live in a single family house in the country - spoke with 2 local extermenatiors each wanted $1500 - $2000 to treat the entire house - no way did we have that to spend so I searched for a pet friendly product - the first worked so so - but this product took care of the problem immediately - I would highly recommend it to anyone experiencing a problem
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Stress reducer!
customer_reviews.text: Followed all instructions and after 2 week apart applications we are bite free. Almost daily inspections reveal not one of the little 'dears'. Our bed is now dressed up in good mattress and box springs encasements and we could be on the road to recovery. However monitoring will continue on a regular basis as will treatment. I should mention the mattress is new and we have new carpet. So if anti-toxic this lifesaver product is for you! Just don't cut corners and the horrors will lessen. Thank you EcoRaider!
customer_reviews.author: Heacham

customer_reviews.title: Seriously buy this if you have bed bugs!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate bugs, I am too damn clean for bugs. Somehow (I suspect the hotel we stayed at during a family vaca) we ended up with bed bugs. It was a super horrible infestation, seemed to only be in one bedroom, but this spray worked great. It has a pine smell to it, but to know it isn't toxic just takes some stress away from an already stressful ordeal. All throughout the summer they would come and go. We used about four bottles to really treat the whole house and it seemed to do the trick. Honestly, probably going to keep this on hand because now I'm paranoid lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: It seems to have worked. Although, I tried a number of things. I actually used this as a follow on to Harris bed bug killer powder product that kills any type of bug with a shell. My hope is the powder kills any bugs that emerge between sprayings. So far, so good. I do plan another application and to continue on an off and on basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We had an influx of family from Hurricane Irma, ...
customer_reviews.text: We had an influx of family from Hurricane Irma, some left a few unwanted guests... I tore the rooms apart, sanitized the sheets, sprayed the mattress, boxsprings, around the footings of the bed, the baseboards. Haven't used any chemicals other than the EcoRaider, and haven't had any problem since. One thing to note, the sprayer is aggressively wide, so it'll cover a wide range; you'll notice on your first spray. We didn't have a heavy infestation, just a few bugs, but this surely nipped it in the bud, before it was a problem.
customer_reviews.author: F. Scott Alder

customer_reviews.title: We we're very disappointed in this product
customer_reviews.text: This is just another product that claims something that isn't true. We we're very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do anything. Homeopathic Snake Oil.
customer_reviews.text: This is just essential oils packed in a bottle. There is no science behind it because it doesn't work. These holistic types loves to claim that their essential oils cure diseases and kill bugs and all kinds of things, but they don't and all the studies have shown that this is a placebo. But hey, it smells nice.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Riley

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF WORKS - PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: We has a serious Bed Bug Infestation in our bed and our couch. We had tried other companies poison filled bombs - all with little effect at all and no lasting effect. We then Bought EcoRaider Bed Bug Killer Spray 1 Gallon Jug and a gallon pump up sprayer. I took care of the little blood sucking buggers in not time flat. There is no need to leave the house for hours like the ineffective Bed Bug Bombs from B**** F*** and others. We are not completely bed bug free but an application a week for a month or so will do the job COMPLETELY! Thank You EcoRaider for a product that works on such an aggravating pest
customer_reviews.author: FrankH

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice to us but didn't work as described.
customer_reviews.text: Treated the entire room including bed frame and mattress, carpet, seams, etc. I also purchased a bed enclosure so I know the bugs aren't coming from the mattress any longer. We also used the bed bug cups for the bed legs and removed the headboard. It has been over three weeks now and we have treated the items twice. Also used diatomaceous earth and still found live bugs. I do not think this product worked as described. We still had bed bugs!!! I ended up purchasing an insecticide from Home Depot specific for bed bugs and since I used the new insecticide we haven't seen any new Bed Bugs.
customer_reviews.author: pkgfinder

customer_reviews.title: Follow Up as Directed
customer_reviews.text: I travel for a living staying in numerous hotels. I brought some unexpected travelers home with me. I tried a highly rated trap, spray and bomb system. It just didn't do the trick after numerous applications. These suckers are hard to kill. I purchased EcoRaider and highly recommend it. You must apply and follow up weekly as directed especially during the second and third weeks. We are now bed bug free. If you can...take your bed apart and spray where assemblies meet, side board, head board and foot board. The little suckers love to hide in the crevices. Do not hesitate to spray your entire bed and surrounding areas include the base boards and night stands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells n works great
customer_reviews.text: We were surprised with these pests from an exterminator that had them on him when he entered our home after treating another home prior with bedbugs. All I can say is even using this you still have to have your home treated professionally. Great product, nice smell!
customer_reviews.author: Old Retired Artist/Chef

customer_reviews.title: SPRAY BOTTLE DEFECTIVE, SELLER NON-RESPONSIVE
customer_reviews.text: I can't truly write an honest review of how effective the product is because the spray bottle became jammed and stopped functioning almost immediately and I can't use it at all. Thankfully, this was purchased as a preventative measure (as opposed to an actual infestation) due to bed bug exposure while traveling. Regardless, because I was only able to get a few sprays out of it, I still have my suitcases outside weeks later because I wasn't able to finish spraying them down. Worse, I left seller feedback several days ago and the company HAS NOT RESPONDED. Very disappointing. At this price, they should be able to supply a decent product free of defects. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Demmerle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the haters, this works great. Only thing you have to make sure to do is shake well before every use! They tell you this but they do not apply the urgency of how important this step it. I'd assume the contents settles and doesn't work unless remixed.
customer_reviews.author: James Daniel Clayton

customer_reviews.title: You know, if nothing else, this smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Amazon for the wonderful customer service. This stuff smells AMAZING! Like everyone else said -- the Garden of Eden. If for nothing else, but it as a better version of scent sprays with nasty chemicals. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: corduroyspocket

customer_reviews.title: This just works.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product we've tried that does exactly what it claims to. It does require a respray, every ten days, for about a month for medium to heavy infestations, and it is important to track down any nesting sites and to spray and clean those out, but the spray does work and it works well. Ecoraider customer service is also excellent and to be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I had bedbugs and used this product alongside diatomaceous earth for a few months and it worked. I bought the biggest jug and pretty much drenched my mattresses and box spring, then would routinely spray them down once a week after I encased the mattresses. I used it on my couch, too...even once accidentally sprayed my cat in the face and he was fine. Hence the reason I got it, so it wouldn't harm them. I don't mind the smell. Felt foresty.
customer_reviews.author: Bibbles

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it works yet, but very strong smell.
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it, not sure of it works yet or not. The spray has a very very strong scent and you need to spray it close to the objects because if sprayed from distance it just stays in the air. I also recommend spray before leaving home, because it irritated eyes and upper respiratory system. I just hope it works/!
customer_reviews.author: Dee361

customer_reviews.title: Best product around to eradicate bedbugs safely and in a non toxic manner.
customer_reviews.text: Picked up a bedbug from a hotel on a business trip in my luggage, and they multiplied. They made their way into the living room. This product killed them all with two treatments. This has a cedar smell that is clean and pleasant. This is the product to use if you are unfortunate enough to happen upon these vile creatures.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: sorry
customer_reviews.text: I just received this it does have an order but not to the point as most sprays i can not breathe and am coughing my head off . as far as working i am not sure as i just got it and just sprayed it. I got this as a prevention as a friend has announced having bed bugs and i want to make sure i dont have visitors that was not invited.
customer_reviews.author: Cinsdesire

customer_reviews.title: Fixed my mice lice
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research, I purchased and used this product to treat my pet mice for lice that the pet store graciously included with my purchase. I wet down both mice with the product and allowed them to dry off. It did not harm them whatsoever and the lice were completely gone with just one treatment! They are doing well now and no longer so itchy. The smell is a bit strong but it makes up for it with its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Hermes

customer_reviews.title: Totally Works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the bomb. It totally works. I don't know who these one star people are, but they are wrong. I had my house tented by terminex. 1 Month later I still had bugs. I then called another exterminator. HE TOLD ME ABOUT THIS STUFF!!!! He said try it. Wash your linens, get the duvet cover, pillow covers, mattress cover, box spring cover and climb up protectors. Then go to it. Spray all around the perimeter of carpet. Head board, under furniture, edges of baseboard and frame of bed. Do again 3 times spaced 3 weeks apart. They will bite for a few more days.........at first.......then DEAD!!! FAB
customer_reviews.author: chesterfield

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Its ridiculous how this stuff works! One use and we haven't seen a bed bug in 2 years now. I still buy the product and use just for safety measures bit IT WORKS! Better than raid pr any of the bombs and sprays I have used in the past. I bought it because my friends house was infested and I was scared I'd bring them to my house. I also gave a bottle to two other households and they rid themselves of them as well! IT REALLY WORKS FRFR
customer_reviews.author: Jade Miles

customer_reviews.title: Waste no time...get and use immediately.
customer_reviews.text: We apparently had one (1) bedbug. Of course, we panicked, one can become a horde in no time. Used this in combination with a product by Harris...that cost twice ad much. I think we got the bug, haven't been bitten in three nights. Smell is kind of a cedar-ish smell, strong at first when sprayed in the morning, but was mostly subdued by bedtime. This is the much safer way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Joe in Frankfort

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I think I had a mild case. I returned home after three months away due to covid. My bed was covered in dead bugs, but there were still some crawling around. I have no idea how I got bugs since I wasn’t home for months. This stuff worked great, along with a mattress cover, harris bed bug killer and catchers for my bed posts. I’ve been bug free for 4 weeks. After spraying this powder everywhere including outlets, I found some dried out dead bugs so it works! Thank heavens because this could’ve been a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jeffrey

product_meta.title: EcoRaider Bed Bug Killer Spray Jug, Green + Non-toxic, 100% Kill + Extended Protection, 128 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
feature_bullets: Entomological society of America: "The most effective natural bed bug killer"
Field proven by usda public health pesticide program in public housing
Kills adults, nymphs & eggs fast on contact with 100% efficacy, even resistant bed bugs
Proven extended residual protection for two weeks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars6,435 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
